name: PAT_ENC_MSP_EGHP
description: This table contains the Primary Employer Group Health Plan Info part of the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file. Some questionnaires use this as the patient's EGHP info rather than the 'primary' EGHP info.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date (calendar format) on which the encounter took place.

columns.name: SELF_EGHP_YN
columns.description: YES if the patient has employer group health plan (EGHP) coverage based on own or a family member's current or former employment.

columns.name: OTHER_EGHP_YN
columns.description: YES if the patient is covered by another employer group health plan (EGHP) in addition to the one listed under Primary EGHP.

columns.name: EGHP_INSURED_NAME
columns.description: Name of the person whose employer group health plan (EGHP) covers the patient.

columns.name: EGHP_REL_SUBSCRB_C_NAME
columns.description: Relationship of the subscriber to the patient.

columns.name: EGHP_PCP
columns.description: Name of the patient's Primary Care Provider.

columns.name: EGHP_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The employer that sponsors the employer group health plan (EGHP).

columns.name: EGHP_EMPL_ADR_1
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) subscriber's employer address line 1.

columns.name: EGHP_EMPL_ADR_2
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) subscriber's employer address line 2.

columns.name: EGHP_EMPL_PHONE
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) subscriber's employer phone number.

columns.name: EGHP_EMPL_CITY
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) subscriber's employer city.

columns.name: EGHP_EMPL_ZIP
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) subscriber's employer zip

columns.name: EGHP_INSUR_COMPANY
columns.description: Name of the employer group health plan (EGHP).

columns.name: CVG_HMO_YN
columns.description: YES if coverage is an HMO.

columns.name: EGHP_POLICY_NUMBER
columns.description: Patient's member number for the employer group health plan (EGHP).

columns.name: EGHP_GROUP_NUMBER
columns.description: Group number of the employer group health plan (EGHP).

columns.name: EGHP_INSUR_ADR_1
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) address line 1.

columns.name: EGHP_INSUR_ADR_2
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) address line 2.

columns.name: EGHP_INSUR_CITY
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) city.

columns.name: EGHP_INSUR_ZIP
columns.description: Employer group health plan (EGHP) Zip.

columns.name: EGHP_PAT_SUP_INF_C
columns.description: Used to store whether or not the patient refused to provide information pertaining to the MSPQ EGHP question.

columns.name: EGHP_BEN_PKG
columns.description: The benefit package number or policy ID number for the employer group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP_CUR_EMPL_YN
columns.description: Yes if the employer group health plan is through the subscriber's current employment. Some questionnaires use this instead of Covered by Employer Group Health Plan (I EPT 4672).

columns.name: MSP_SELF_NUMBER_EMPLOYEES_C_NAME
columns.description: MSP Item: tracks the number of employees of the patient's GHP provider
